properties.entry: SELECT S.SCHEDULE_NO "SCHEDULE_NO", TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') SCHEDULE_TIME, SERVICE_TYPE , MEMBER_NM FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN BOOKING B ON(S.SCHEDULE_NO = B.SCHEDULE_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = S.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
